summary: A delicious, mysterious goo that oozes from the earth is marketed as the newest dessert sensation, but the tasty treat rots more than teeth when zombie-like snackers who only want to consume more of the strange substance at any cost begin infesting the world.
cast: Michael Moriarty|Andrea Marcovicci|Garrett Morris|Paul Sorvino|Scott Bloom|Danny Aiello|Patrick O'Neal|James Dixon|Alexander Scourby|Russell Nype|Gene O'Neill|Catherine Schultz|James Dukas|Peter Hock|Colette Blonigan|Robert Frank Telfer|Brian Bloom|Harry Bellaver|Beth Tegarden|Ann Dane|Rutanya Alda|David Snell|Edward Power|Nick Taylor|Daniel Antonovich|Heidi Miller|Marilyn Staley|Adrianne Sachs|John Newton|Harvey Waldman|Nicolas De Toth|Bobbie Burns|Gretchen Ullman|Jery Hewitt|Lisa Crosby|Christine Angelica|Brooke Adams|Laurene Landon|Tammy Grimes|Abe Vigoda|Clara Peller|Eric Bogosian|Patrick Dempsey|John Loughlin|Brad Rijn|Mira Sorvino|Drew Stanley
title: La sustancia maldita
